newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $922 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $922 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Thursday are expected to total $922 million in 26 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $785 million in 11 sales, with a $220 million Delaware Valley Regional Finance deal through Merrill Lynch topping the list.
On the competitive side, 15 sales totaling $137 million are scheduled. A $32 million Virginia Housing Development Authority deal at 1100 EDT is the largest.
An additional two sales totaling $175 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues Thursday depending on market conditions.
